participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and nurturing with a creative side.
participant_1.background: I travel to the mountains and enjoy my free time. I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed. I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time. I play the drums. My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Competitive and dedicated, with a strong appreciation for literature.
participant_2.background: I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. My favorite color is purple. I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body. I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion. My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy running marathons. I love the feeling of accomplishment I get after I finish a race.
That's great! I love to travel and explore new places. I'm also a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
That's awesome! I have a collection of children's books that I love to read. I also spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
That's great! I love to play the drums. I also have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed.
That's great! I love cats! I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
That's understandable. I'm sure you'll do great!
